htmlBody: Wonder if there might be some avenue of leading groups holding equity stakes in each other as an angle of aligning incentives. Imperfect analogy is in the auto industry, for example how Toyota/ Subaru and others hold equity in each other and share best practices in safety/hybrid tech. https://www.reuters.com/article/us-toyota-subaru/toyota-strengthens-japan-partnerships-with-bigger-subaru-stake-idUSKBN1WC04E
